name: Burger Stand Sim
description:
Ever wondered how easy it would be to run your own burger stand? A plethora of choices to create your own burger you think your customers will love. Set your price, pay the rent and watch the customers either walk on by or buy your burger! Customer's will provide you feedback so you know what they love, or what they hate. The more you play, the more you learn and the more money you will earn! 

Early prototype of an idea. All feedback not only welcome, but encouraged!
